about_the_game:
VPet is a desktop pet software(game) that supports various interactive. it is open source, free and support Steam workshops

This game is independent from the built-in desktop pet (tutorial) program of VUP Simulator, if you like it, you can also add VUP Simulator to your wishlist

Lots of interactions and animations


More than 200 Type of Animation,

Some Animation Examples:
touch the head & Body


bring up

dance

climb the wall


See more image resources details in open source docs

Free


The game is completely free!
The main purpose of the game is to promote the VUP-Simulator, This is the desktop pet inside the VUP Simulator.

Open Source


The game is open source on github, welcome to put forward your own ideas, ideas or participate in the development!
You can also modify the code to make your own table pet! (Although most of the content supports the workshop, is no need to modify the code)
project address: github-LorisYounger/VPet

Support Steam Workshop


The game supports the Steam Workshop, you can make animations or interactions with other characters and table pets, and upload them to the creative workshop to share with more people.

The creative workshop supports adding/modifying the following content
The creative workshop supports adding/modifying the following content
  • Table pet animation
  • Items/food/beverages, etc
  • Table pet work
  • Speech text
  • Theme
  • Code plugin - Add content to desktop pets by writing code
    • Add new animation logic/display scheme (eg: l2d/spin, etc.)
    • Add new features (alarm clock/dashboard, etc.)
    • Almost omnipotent

Feedback & Suggestions & Contact Us


If you have any suggestions or comments, you can contact me in Steam store Comments/Community, Github Issue or email me

highlighted.name: Human body is made up of 60% beverages
Buy melon seeds for the desktop pet!

movies.name: 虚拟桌宠模拟器 宣传片

name: VPet-Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: win 7
  • Processor: 2 Core CPU
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Iris or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win 10
  • Processor: 2 Core CPU
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Iris or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Feeling like the computer desktop is too dull? Need something cute to heal oneself? Come and try this new completely free and open source V-Pet simulator. A cute and adorable pet that supports various feeding interactions to accompany you in game learning is definitely your best choice!
